page.title: 07HOUSING
page.content: Mainly of attractive{Bath}stone.Types include small & large Georgian terrace properties,modern detached,semi detached,large Victorian mansions, flats and apartments.Current prices range from{Â£15000}for modest cottage to over{Â£150,000}for large desirable residence.Cross section of properties in area include:- 1.Small, middle{terrace cottage - Batheaston.1 bedroom- outside toilet-Â£15,000 2.2nd floor{purpose built flat}-2 beds, bath -Swainswick - Â£32,950 3.Bathampton{-semi-detached house}-3 beds-gas central heating,double glazing.Â£39,250 4.Â£125,000 -Bathampton{-detached}-5 beds-2 baths -swimming pool 5 Landed property -{small country {estate.}15 acres at Bathford.Riparian rights on River Avon.Â£160,000
